name: Troddlers
summary: Troddlers is a 1992 Lemmings-inspired puzzle game developed by Atod that was originally released for the Amiga and was later remade on the Super Nintendo. The remake was published by Seika. An MS-DOS port was also released.
info:
• 中文名: 所罗门之星
  • 平台: Amiga
  • 平台: MS-DOS
  • 平台: SFC
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 1992年
  • 开发: Atod
  • 发行: The Sales Curve
